post.body: lmao!
yummy! thanx
can you send recipe to my chef husband? @deadlydanny
ohwow yum
LOL!!
hold me, love me, make me feel wanted. I always feel alone and pointless. :(!
I love you
of course! I'm always in search of all the best goth stuff and your site is a goth girls must see!
yeah, we can talk about it. maybe on tuesday web he stops working for a while /:
the dark element is why goth chicks look so hot, and the fact that we are different and appear tough.
I love you danny, I love you so so much. I'm tired of crying every night because of this. I'm so tired of missing you! :,(
yummy!
mariokart rules
lmao! yay!
LOL! no problem
where should I post it or email it? I can just post it on my personal blog as public (like all my other posts) or..? lol
hmm. well what do you want me to write about? being green I'm guessing but any particular topic or way of writing and..
hahaa wow sounds interesting. you must be in a much bigger city than me
a personal blog of which is random rants with incorrect punctuation and stuff.. http://rondav.livejournal.com
well I don't live anywhere near you. if you'd rather work with someone closer, than idk if I should try? I do have...
strange yet enlightening, yours? ps- do you want me to write something since I have no previous examples?
pimples suck!! :(
lmao that they are
hahaha!!! GO SEE " the day the earth stood still" it's AMAZING
don't we all? LOL I loved that movie.
right? RIGHT? omfg I couldn't believe it. I feel sick. oooof
I would have to agree! :)
just one and nah it's the stench of my mother in laws cooking
LOL!
I'm so sorry
pssh
yup LOL but it's just an earl grey latte really haha with vanilla syrup for sweetener google "London fog latte" for details
it really is. my new obsession.
you should try the London Fog Latte!
that's really strange!
earl grey tea and milk (soy in my case)
talked to my mom now. she's wacky. I can tell she was lying about stuff. ge'ez. the clouds are moving quite fast!
Just took my 38th mugshot! http://www.dailymugshot.com/main/show/7111
my poor dad. I just called him.
awake I guess. no good news this morning. cat keeps waking me up when I doze off..
I can't stay awake, although I'd love to text with danny on his break. it's the only way we talk anymore, and all a say is "I love you" b&f
I can't believe the nasty of the toilet. you'd think SOMEONE would care what their sitting on. it's been dirty with ___ all day!
left gummybear inside. she ran under chris's bed when I tried to get her. I almost puked even going near the door of his room.
the sky is beautiful tonight. I wish I had a good enough camera to show everyone how I see it.
I MIGHT have to work tomorrow. ugh at questionable working. I still dunno if I get paid for being on call or not.
if you consider your self goth or gothic or dark then go follow @EcoGoth !!
awake enough to see danny off to work. laying with my wiener dog now. alarm set for 9:30 for working on call
going to bed now and all that jazzzzzzzz damn ear makes me have to sleep on my arm which hurts to sleep on and so... eh.
doing a few random things and then I guess bed. danny is missing ..!? thinking about making a websiteblog. should be interesting.
eating an Xmas cherios marshmellow thing (think rice krispie treat with cheerios)
I'm so frustrated, ugh
EVERYONE MUST GO SEE "THE DAY THE EARTH STOOD STILL"!!!!!!!!
standing on the front porch trying not to puke. brought my wiener dog who is sniffing stuff.
OMFG EWW my mother in law just sneezed all over the food! and she didn't move or do anything but continue on with what she was doing.. EWWW
the way my mother in law is cooking their "hamburgers", the whole house smells like fried food of some sort. no wonder I feel sick. UGHF
I will NOT be eating with my inlaws tonight. hamburgers. not only is it red meat (ehh) but they buy the cheapest ground beef (with high fat)
now my tummy is sickish and I feel weird. NOT happy. headache still here but not as bad. OFFG
rrrrg my in laws piss me off. "it's weird how bananas cure muscle cramps better than anything else" UHM DUH- NATURAL ALWAYS WORKS BETTER!!!
I'm really annoyed by my brothers in laws quoting movies in unison like huge mentally retarded people tend to do.. aparently.
headache ouch. tea helped temporarily but ughf it's back
